name: map_Maybe
typ: a =&> b -> Maybe a =&> Maybe b
a =&> Maybe b -> b =&> Maybe c -> a =&> Maybe c

name: distribMaybe
typ: Monad m => Lift m (Maybe a) =&> Maybe (Lift m a)
((x : a .message) -> Σ (b .message) (\y => b .response y -> a .response x)) -> a =&> b

name: .continuation
typ: a =&> b -> (x : a .message) -> Σ (b .message) (\y => b .response y -> a .response x)

name: continuation
typ: a =&> b -> (x : a .message) -> Σ (b .message) (\y => b .response y -> a .response x)

name: bimapEx
typ: a =&> b -> (t -> s) -> Ex a t -> Ex b s

name: comp2Unit
typ: a =&> End -> b =&> End -> (a &> b) =&> End

name: map_Lift
typ: Functor f => a =&> b -> Lift f a =&> Lift f b

name: counit
typ: Monad m => Lift m a =&> a

name: comult
typ: Monad m => Lift m a =&> Lift m (Lift m a)

name: coKleisli
typ: Monad m => Lift m a =&> b -> Lift m b =&> c -> Lift m a =&> c

name: distrib_plus
typ: Lift f (a + b) =&> (Lift f a + Lift f b)

name: distrib_plus_3
typ: Lift f ((a + b) + c) =&> ((Lift f a + Lift f b) + Lift f c)

name: seq2M
typ: Monad m => Costate (Lift m a) -> Costate (Lift m b) -> Costate (Lift m (a &> b))

name: runSequenceM3
typ: Monad m => (input : State ((a &> b) &> c)) -> Costate (Lift m a) -> Costate (Lift m b) -> Costate (Lift m c) -> m (((a &> b) &> c) .response (input .getVal))

name: map
typ: mor a b -> mor (f a) (f b)

name: bimap
typ: mor a b -> mor x y -> mor (f a x) (f b y)
Category mor => APIMonad mor f => mor a (f b) -> mor b (f c) -> mor a (f c)
Category mor => APIComonad mor f => mor (f a) b -> mor (f b) c -> mor (f a) c

name: MkEx
typ: (req : c .message) -> (c .response req -> ty) -> Ex c ty

name: ioFwd'
typ: Monad m => (a -> m b) -> MonMor m id (a :- c) (b :- c)

name: ioFwd
typ: Monad m => (a -> m b) -> (a :- c) - [m] > (b :- c)

name: ioBwd'
typ: Monad m => (a -> m b) -> MonMor id m (c :- b) (c :- a)

name: ioBwd
typ: Monad m => (a -> m b) -> (c :- b) - [m] > (c :- a)

name: readFile'
typ: HasIO io => MonMor io id (String :- a) (FSError + (String :- a))

name: putStrLn'
typ: HasIO io => MonMor id io (a :- ()) (a :- String)

name: readFileToBuffer
typ: HasIO io => File -> io (Either FileError Buffer)

typ: Applicative f => Applicative g => APIFunctor (MonMor f g) ((a +))

name: APIPointedSum
typ: Applicative f => Applicative g => APIPointed (MonMor f g) ((a +))

name: APIPointedMonad
typ: Monad f => Monad g => APIMonad (MonMor f g) ((a +))

name: cli
typ: HasIO io => (List String -> io String) -> io ()

name: cli'
typ: HasIO io => Costate (Lift io CLI) -> io ()

name: MkFlag
typ: {default Nothing _ : Maybe String} -> (fullFlag : String) -> checkNonEmpty fullFlag => Flag

name: MkGenericCommand
typ: (input : Type) -> Parser input -> (output : Type) -> Show output -> String -> GenericCommand

name: MkFlagCommand
typ: (input : Type) -> Parser input => (output : Type) -> Show output => Flag -> String -> FlagCommand

name: GetAPI'
typ: All (\x => x) xs -> All ToCommand xs => API

name: repl
typ: HasIO io => (String -> io String) -> io Void

typ: HasIO io => Costate (Lift io REPL) -> io Void

name: pureRepl
typ: HasIO io => Costate REPL -> io Void

typ: a =%> b -> Maybe a =%> Maybe b
a =%> Maybe b -> b =%> Maybe c -> a =%> Maybe c

typ: Monad m => Lift m (Maybe a) =%> Maybe (Lift m a)

name: StarM
typ: (x : c .response x1) -> StarPos c (x2 x) -> StarPos c (More (MkEx x1 x2))

typ: a =%> b -> StarShp a -> StarShp b

name: mapStarPos
typ: (mor : a =%> b) -> (x : StarShp a) -> StarPos b (mapStarShp mor x) -> StarPos a x

name: runStar
typ: a =%> b .star -> b =%> End -> a =%> End

name: ending
typ: Applicative f => Applicative g => Costate f g (Maybe End)

name: toCoproduct
typ: Applicative f => Applicative g => MonMor f g (Maybe b) (End + b)

name: maybe
typ: Monad f => Monad g => MonMor f g End a -> MonMor f g b a -> MonMor f g (Maybe b) a

typ: MonMor f g a b -> (x : a .message) -> f (Σ (b .message) (\y => b .response y -> g (a .response x)))

name: fromLifted

name: pure
typ: Applicative m => a =&> b -> a - [m] > b

name: compose
typ: Monad f => Monad g => MonMor f g a b -> MonMor f g b c -> MonMor f g a c

name: identity
typ: Applicative f => Applicative g => MonMor f g a a

name: bimapEx
typ: Monad f => Monad g => MonMor f g a b -> (t -> s) -> Ex a t -> f (Ex b (g s))

name: parallel

name: concurrent

name: biSequence
typ: Monad f => MonMor f g a b -> MonMor f g a' b' -> MonMor f g (a &> a') (b &> b')

name: choice

name: inr

name: elimChoice

name: sumRUnit

typ: a =%> End -> b =%> End -> (a &> b) =%> End

typ: Functor f => a =%> b -> Lift f a =%> Lift f b
